topicTitle: Corpse Bomb And or poison darts

posts.postText: I think nnjg should make a corpse bomb in the traitor store which u place on a corpse and whoever identifies it blows up or maybe a spawned fake body by a traitor that had a bomb that blew up and killed identifier. And or maybe a poison dart gun to shoot someone there poisoned and after poisoned (10 damage a second)
Theres like 5 threads for each of these ideas by thatguy and flame

We've had the poison darts before I think.. They were removed..Or not, I have no idea really. I just
remember poisonous darts
You want poison darts? Go play some League of Legends and play Teemo. Hes my main XD

>> We've had the poison darts before I think.. They were removed..Or not, I have no idea really. I just
remember poisonous darts 

We had them, and when you got shot it played the soundclip of bream after mossman betrayed him.
I don't know why they were removed.
Poison Dart is completely useless now, the knife beats it in every aspect, unless the dart has superior range but even then you have a traitor sniper also.
I believe the dart gun should be brought back partly because of the reactions of the players knowing they only have twenty seconds to live and maybe adding a exspensive antidote in the f4 shop.
